Reviews.Title: Great product and price
Reviews.Author: Jason Bailey
Reviews.Content: This package deal is great. The price and the accessories really make the superb camera product that's a "must have."

Reviews.Title: T5i
Reviews.Author: RICARDO MAYORGA
Reviews.Content: I love the price and I love the camera with the bundle package. The new lens is amazing I love it.

ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 16 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:
<1> Canon EOS Rebel T5i Digital SLR Camera & EF-S 18-55mm IS STM Lens + <2> Canon EF-S 55-250mm II IS Lens + <3> Transcend 32GB Class10 SD Card + <4> Precision Design DSLR300 Flash +
<5> Spare LP-E8 Battery + <6> Vivitar 58mm UV Glass Filter + <7> Additional Vivitar 58mm UV Glass Filter + <8> RC-6 Shutter Remote Control +
<9> PD 2.5x Tele & .45x Wide Lens + <10> PD Digital SLR Camera Case + <11> Precision Design 58" Tripod + <12> HDMI to Mini-HDMI Cable +
<13> PD SDHC Memory Card Reader + <14> PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit + <15> PD Memory Card Storage Wallet + <16> LCD Monitor Screen Protectors
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS Rebel T5i Digital SLR Camera & EF-S 18-55mm IS STM Lens with EF-S 55-250mm IS Lens + 32GB Card + Battery + Case + Flash + Tele/Wide Lenses Kit
